room_title: Escape room "Escape the Safe House" by Escapehouse Chicago in Chicago
review: Super fun, very professional, and really keeps you going the full hour. Can't wait to do another soon.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Safe House" by Escapehouse Chicago in Chicago
review: So much fun! We had two families experience the escape room today. Fantastic. We returned after Saving the White House last year. Glad to have experienced both rooms at Escape House. Agent Dark Heart was exceptional. Great with our kids and a lot of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Safe House" by Escapehouse Chicago in Chicago
review: My children and I joined a group of four others to attempt to solve puzzles, crack codes and discover hidden clues to successfully impress CONTROL in order to join their ranks as spies. We found this adventure challenging and fun. It required critical thought, teamwork and clear communication. The staff was accommodating and accessible. Agent Dark Heart was particularly good to work with and helpful in the journey. We would highly recommend the experience and plan on returning to attempt a new adventure and are looking forward to the opening of Safe House restaurant in February.Thanks EscapeHouse Chicago! We had a blast.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Safe House" by Escapehouse Chicago in Chicago
review: My group of 8 loved our experience at the EscapeHouse! The Agent room was a fantastic companion through the 60-minute adventure. It was very fun and just challenging enough to scratch our heads. We finished with 4 minutes left on the clock and 2 clues used. We were definitely feeling the pressure! Thank you so much for the great experience!
